CustomField.description: Used to hold a campaign partner member's related e-signature filed packet that is related to a self signer format. This works in conjunction with automation that pulls files into the button to create e-sig file to send off to clients. This is for non standard ones that have exceptions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Florida base documents for Non Standard file for Power of Attorney Signer. A variation to the standard that requires separate considerations.
CustomField.label: FL Non-Standard E-Sig (POA)
